about_subtitle: A GUI for managing and executing Robot Framework tests on Android devices.
acknowledgements_text:
This application is built with Python and relies on several fantastic open-source projects:

•  **Python**: The core programming language.
•  **Tkinter**: Python's standard GUI library.
•  **ttkbootstrap**: For modern, themed widgets in Tkinter.
•  **Robot Framework**: The generic open source automation framework.
•  **Appium**: For mobile test automation.
•  **Scrcpy**: For high-performance screen mirroring.
•  **pywin32**: For Windows-specific API calls.
adb_command_tooltip: Enter any ADB command without the 'adb' prefix.
app_author_tooltip: Robot Runner - by Lucas de Eiroz Rodrigues
app_packages_tooltip: Comma-separated list of app package names for the performance monitor.
appium_already_running: INFO: Appium server is already running on port {port}.
appium_not_found_message: Could not check Appium version. Make sure it is installed and in your PATH.
appium_not_found_starting: Appium server not found. Starting it automatically...
appium_running_message: An Appium server seems to be already running. Please stop it before starting a new one from this application.
appium_start_fail_error: Failed to start the Appium server. Check the logs in the Settings tab.
appium_start_generic_error: ERROR: Failed to start Appium server: {e}
appium_started_successfully: INFO: Appium server started successfully on port {port}.
appium_starting_silent_error: ERROR: Could not start Appium server silently. Process failed.
appium_startup_timeout: ERROR: Appium server did not start within {timeout} seconds.
appium_stop_error: ERROR: Could not stop Appium server: {e}
appium_terminate_warning: WARNING: Could not terminate Appium process tree (PID: {pid}). It might have already finished. Error: {e}
appium_toggle_tooltip: Starts or stops the Appium server.
appium_version_error: Could not check Appium version. Is it installed and in your PATH?
clear_tooltip: Clears the search and displays all elements.
connect_tooltip: Connect to a device using IP and Port.
copy_error_message: Failed to copy XPath to clipboard: {error}
disconnect_tooltip: Disconnect a specific IP:Port, or all devices if fields are empty.
device_toolbox_tooltip: Opens a window with mirroring and other controls for the selected device(s).
devices_tooltip: Selects device(s) to run tests on. Use Ctrl+Click or Shift+Click for multiple selections.
download_error_no_release: Could not find a compatible (win64) Scrcpy release for download.
get_device_info_error: ERROR: Could not get device info for {udid}
get_ui_dump_error: ERROR: Failed to get UI dump.
group_by_tooltip: Select how to group the displayed logs.
input_error_connect: Please enter an IP Address and Port to connect.
input_error_pair: Please enter IP Address, Port, and Pairing Code to pair.
inspector_auto_refresh_tooltip: Automatically refresh the inspector when UI changes are detected.
invalid_selection_message: Please select a valid test or suite file to run.
language_tooltip: Select the application language. Requires restart to apply changes.
log_write_error: ERROR: Could not write to log file. Error: {error}
mirroring_tooltip: Starts or stops the device screen mirror.

no_active_recording_error: ERROR: No active recording process found to stop.
no_log_files_found: No log files found to parse.
no_logs_found: No logs found for the selected criteria.
no_test_file_selected: No test or suite file selected.
no_xpath_message: Could not generate XPath for the selected element with the chosen attribute.
pair_tooltip: Pair with a device using IP, Port, and Pairing Code.
parsing_summary: Found {total_found} logs. Parsing {to_parse} for this period.
parsing_tooltip: Parsing logs... This may take a while depending on the number of logs.
period_tooltip: Select the time period for the logs to display.
pull_ui_dump_error: ERROR: Failed to pull UI dump.
pywin32_required:
The 'pywin32' library is required for scrcpy embedding on Windows.
Please install it by running: pip install pywin32
quit_message: Do you want to quit Robot Runner?
recording_start_error:
ERROR: Failed to start recording process.
{error}
recording_unresponsive_warning: WARNING: Recording process unresponsive, killing it.
refresh_devices_tooltip: Refreshes the list of connected devices.
refresh_tooltip: Refreshes the screenshot and UI element list.
reparse_tooltip: Force a re-parse of all logs for the selected period.
reparsing_logs_for_period: Reparsing all logs for period: {period}. This might take a moment...
restart_required_message: Theme change will be applied on the next application restart.
robot_process_already_finished: INFO: Robot process was already finished.
robot_run_fatal_error:
FATAL ERROR: Failed to run robot test.
{error}
run_command_tooltip: Run the specified ADB command and see the output below.
run_test_tooltip: Runs the selected test suite or test on the selected device.
save_settings_tooltip: Saves all current settings to settings.json.
screenshot_dimension_warning: WARNING: Could not get screenshot dimensions for resizing: {error}
screenshot_tooltip: Takes a screenshot and saves it to the 'screenshots' folder.
scrcpy_download_error: Failed to download or extract Scrcpy: {error}
scrcpy_download_success:
Scrcpy downloaded and extracted successfully to:
{path}
scrcpy_embed_error_invalid_handle: ERROR: Scrcpy handle invalid before embedding.
scrcpy_embed_error_win32: ERROR: A win32 error occurred during embedding: {error}
scrcpy_find_window_error: ERROR: Could not find scrcpy window '{title}'.
scrcpy_not_found_message: Scrcpy was not found on your system. Would you like to download and install it automatically into the application folder?
scrcpy_start_error:
FATAL ERROR: Failed to start scrcpy process.
{error}
scrcpy_version_error: Could not check scrcpy version. Is it installed and in your PATH?
search_inspector_element_tooltip: Searches for the element entered in the inspector search
search_tooltip: Finds elements matching the XPath in the current UI dump.
select_app_package_warning: Please select an app package to monitor.
select_app_to_monitor_tooltip: Select the app to be monitored
settings_saved_message: Your settings have been saved successfully.
stop_recording_on_close: INFO: Stopping active recording before closing...
terminate_process_warning: WARNING: Could not terminate {name} process tree (PID: {pid}). It might have already finished. Error: {e}
test_finished: --- Test execution finished with return code: {code} ---
theme_tooltip: Select the application theme. Requires restart to apply changes.
timestamp_logs_tooltip: Generate a unique log file for this test run
wireless_code_tooltip: Pairing code for the wireless device
wireless_ip_tooltip: IP address of the wireless device
